peopleAlsoAsk.question: How much is real jade worth today?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
Hetian white jade pieces: Premium stones can fetch anywhere from $1,400 to $140,000 per gram, particularly sought after in China. Mid-range jade: Good-quality jadeite or nephrite typically costs $700 to $7,000 per piece, with variations based on craftsmanship and authenticity.
Dec 28, 2024
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How Much Is Jade Worth and the Most Expensive Jade Types

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What color jade is most valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Jadeite comes in a wide range of colors. The most valuable is an intense green called Imperial.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Jadeite Jade Quality Factors - GIA

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to tell if jade is valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: As with all other gemstones, the value of jade is determined by several factors, including its type, color, clarity, size, and craftsmanship. Jadeite, being rarer and more sought after, generally commands higher prices than nephrite jade.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Jade Jewelry: A Beginner's Guide

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the most expensive jade color 2021?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
"Imperial jade," jadeite with deep green color from Myanmar (formerly known as Burma), is very rare and expensive, and its translucency is highly prized. This variety commands the highest prices on the market.
Apr 1, 2025
